label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_012
content:
## 2024-05-20 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 93
- Active: 89
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 27
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 31
- Standard: 31
- Placebo: 31

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.3
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 35.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 336.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 32.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 26.3
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.0
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.4

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.3
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 44.3
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.6
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 288.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 50.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.0
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.4
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 45.3
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.4
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 265.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 51.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.8
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.7
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.7

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 185
- Sessions Attended: 178
- Attendance Rate (%): 89.4

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (K) Mean: 6.0
- WBC (K) SD: 1.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 247
- Platelets (K) SD: 43
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.07
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.19
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 91.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1235, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1249, Description: pruritus, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1226, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 12: Pain management assessments on track. 93 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
